title: Refactor large Vue component into logical sections
description: 752-line Vue component does too much. Need better organization or Composition API. Location: app/app.js

title: Consolidate docker-compose configurations
description: Two docker-compose files (dev and prod) with unclear separation. Consider single file with profiles or better documentation.
close_reason: Consolidated to single docker-compose.yml with profiles. Production uses --profile prod.

title: Add user-visible error feedback system
description: API failures are silent - no user feedback. Need toast/notification system for errors. Location: app/app.js:89-134, app/app.js:136-148
close_reason: Implemented error feedback system with toast notifications. Errors now visible to users.

title: Disable API logging to prevent token exposure
description: API tokens passed as headers could be logged by nginx. Need to disable access_log for /api/ endpoints. Location: nginx.conf.template:73-76
close_reason: Disabled access_log for /api/ endpoint. API tokens no longer logged.

title: Create .env file from .env.example
description: Project requires .env file to run. Need to create from .env.example with user's Linkding credentials.
close_reason: Created .env from .env.example. User must update with real Linkding credentials before deployment.

title: Replace magic numbers with constants
description: Many hardcoded values (timeouts, limits, thresholds) should be named constants. Location: app/app.js throughout
close_reason: Replaced all magic numbers with CONSTANTS object. Maintainability improved.

title: Fix icon cache memory leak with LRU eviction
description: iconCache Map grows unbounded without size limits. Could consume significant memory with thousands of bookmarks. Need LRU cache with max size. Location: app/app.js:21, app/app.js:201-228
close_reason: Implemented LRU cache with 500-entry limit. Memory leak fixed.

title: Add environment variable validation in entrypoint.sh
description: Basic validation doesn't check URL format or token validity. Need format validation and placeholder detection. Location: entrypoint.sh:14-17
close_reason: Implemented comprehensive validation for env vars. Placeholder detection added.

title: Implement CSP and SRI for CDN scripts
description: Missing Content Security Policy headers and Subresource Integrity checks for Vue.js and Tailwind CSS CDN scripts. Location: nginx.conf.template, app/index.html:7-8
close_reason: Implemented CSP headers and SRI for Vue/Tailwind CDN scripts. Versions pinned.

title: Reuse drag preview DOM element
description: Creating/destroying DOM on every drag is inefficient. Need single reusable preview element. Location: app/app.js:525-541
close_reason: Implemented reusable preview element. DOM manipulation reduced.

title: Add ARIA labels and accessibility improvements
description: Missing accessibility attributes for screen readers. Need aria-label, role, and sr-only helpers. Location: app/index.html
close_reason: Implemented ARIA labels and screen reader support. Accessibility improved.

title: Add retry logic to loadAllBookmarks
description: No retry or user feedback on bookmark loading failure. Need retry with exponential backoff. Location: app/app.js:389-419
close_reason: Implemented retry logic with exponential backoff and UI retry button.

title: Create centralized error messages
description: Inconsistent error messages throughout. Need ERROR_MESSAGES constant object. Location: app/app.js error handling
close_reason: Centralized all error messages in ERROR_MESSAGES object. Consistency improved.

title: Optimize CSS (remove redundant styles)
description: Some redundant CSS declarations and missing @media (hover: hover) for touch devices. Location: app/styles.css
close_reason: Optimized CSS with @media (hover: hover) and removed redundant styles.

title: Cache sorted results in computed properties
description: Computed properties re-sort on every access. Need caching with version tracking. Location: app/app.js:40-65
close_reason: Implemented cache with version tracking. Re-sorting eliminated.

title: Fix XSS vulnerability in search highlighting
description: Search highlighting uses v-html without HTML sanitization. Malicious bookmark names could inject JavaScript. Need to add escapeHtml() function before highlighting. Location: app/app.js:301-316, app/index.html:160-161
close_reason: Implemented HTML escaping before highlighting. XSS vulnerability fixed.

title: Add URL validation for bookmark navigation
description: No validation of URLs before navigation. javascript: or data: URLs could execute. Need isSafeUrl() validation. Location: app/app.js:512, app/app.js:696
close_reason: Implemented isSafeUrl() validation. javascript: and data: URLs are now blocked.

title: Fix race condition in search debouncing
description: Search controller abortion has race condition where wrong controller might be cleared. Need unique search IDs. Location: app/app.js:319-360, app/app.js:732-737
close_reason: Implemented unique search IDs. Race condition in debouncing fixed.

title: Improve build.sh safety and validation
description: Missing set -euo pipefail, unsafe .env parsing with xargs. Need safe env loading and git error handling. Location: build.sh:8
close_reason: Implemented safe env loading, validation, and error handling. Build script hardened.

title: Optimize local cache updates (O(n) complexity)
description: updateLocalCache() iterates through all sections and iconCache entries. Need indexed lookup. Location: app/app.js:442-466
close_reason: Optimized updateLocalCache() to avoid O(n) iterations. Performance improved.

title: Add visual feedback for icon updates
description: No loading state or confirmation when updating icons via drag-drop. Need toast notifications. Location: app/app.js:625-655
close_reason: Implemented visual feedback with loading and success/error states.

title: Optimize Dockerfile for smaller image
description: Can combine RUN commands to reduce layers and add HEALTHCHECK directive. Location: Dockerfile
close_reason: Optimized Dockerfile with combined layers and HEALTHCHECK. Image size reduced.
